Tech.title: Memory loss: As AI gobbles up chips, prices for devices may rise
Tech.description: Demand for memory chips currently exceeds supply and there's very little chance of that changing any time soon. More chips for AI means less available for other products such as computers and phones and that could drive up those prices too.
